---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /staking/near/undelegate/get-flow-status-withdrawn
---

To get the current state of the existing flow, send a `GET` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]` using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://near-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/96237daf-973a-456b-ae07-a5e16eeffbd1' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `withdraw_tx_broadcasting` to `withdrawn`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {4,26-35}
{
  "id": "4f866b7f-2e79-4c61-9bb4-398777c12a0b",
  "operation": "unstaking",
  "state": "withdrawn",
  "actions": [],
  "data": {
    "delegator_address": "0b81cc09294fc074814ad0de50f31644e5669f856105399b.testnet",
    "delegator_pubkey": "ed25519:NUbTcj78nHFFm1J8a1GFjenAnCKV32ZdBeeqem8oyLV",
    "validator_address": "legends.pool.f863973.m0",
    "max_gas": null,
    "undelegate_amount": "5.0",
    "undelegate_maximum": null,
    "undelegate_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "ab06236a0916604347fbbfc0c803d374fd28e6eb69f2edce3c2e6ac23e1f0452",
      "signed": " ",
      "hash": "CWc9R6SdHVwVHj1rhYiwBgK2sqkVdbBj1wG4QniUXwqT",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [],
      "block_time": null
    },
    "estimated_inactive_at": "2023-03-01T18:29:48.741Z",
    "withdraw_amount": "5.0",
    "withdraw_maximum": null,
    "withdraw_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "3d86e4c351bc002fd7fbdb0686cc872393c87ffe3a4470cb010857bc739d6784",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "59BAsPfQtJEzaNJghq6HYDhTBupTUvm63FRNdXG447vb",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [],
      "block_time": "2023-03-01T18:22:50.630Z"
    }
  },
  "network_code": "near",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2023-02-27T17:51:08.550Z",
  "updated_at": "2023-03-01T18:23:01.589Z"
}
```

### Undelegate Flow Complete

Congratulations, your NEAR is unbonded and withdrawn back to your liquid balance and this flow is complete!
